name: Mechanization
description:
Mechanization

Mechanization is a factory building game.
Assemble your factory from the ground up, utilizing an array of droppers, conveyor belts, smelters, upgraders and more!
Unveil new items via the tech tree using research points, gained from creating production lines.
Expand your land to accommodate an ever-growing assembly of production facilities and add factory modules to enhance your factory's efficiency.

Features

  • Resource droppers that drop ores
  • Smelters that smelt and sell ores
  • Tech Tree system for balanced progression
  • Conveyor belts that transport ores around your factory
  • Upgraders that attach to conveyors and upgrade ore that pass through it
  • Factory modules that can enhance your factory's efficiency
